page.title: 06An Adult's Day.
page.content: {Mr. Hastings}is an actor.Sometimes he is working and sometimes he is "resting".When in work he begins at 10:00 am.He does a series of warming up exercises for about 15 minutes, followed by general rehearsals until 11:30 am. He has a break until 2:00 pm then back to work. Another break at 3:00 pm is followed by more rehearsals at 5:00 pm. At 6:55 he receives his half-hour call for the beginning of the performance. At 7:30 pm the stage manager calls the actors on stage for the performance in front of an audience.Mr. Hastings has done quite a bit of work for Colchester's Mercury Theatre, as well as doing adverts for commercial television.
